oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The World of Organic Agriculture. Statistics and Emerging Trends 2015
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Africa
Asia
Australia
Canada
European Union

oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This book documents recent developments in organic agriculture worldwide and presents the latest data on organic areas, producers and domestic markets.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Research Institute of Organic Agriculture (FiBL) and International Federation of Organic Agriculture Movements (IFOAM)
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Willer, Helga and Lernoud, Julia (Eds.) (2015) The World of Organic Agriculture. Statistics and Emerging Trends 2015. FiBL-IFOAM Report. Research Institute of Organic Agriculture (FiBL) and International Federation of Organic Agriculture Movements (IFOAM), Frick and Bonn.
